meanings.definition: A fan of the singer Taylor Swift.
meanings.sent1: I am a dedicated swiftie who knows all of Taylor Swift's songs by heart.
meanings.sent2: The swiftie camped outside the concert venue for hours to get the best spot.
meanings.sent3: Why did the swiftie bring a blanket to the Taylor Swift concert? To stay cozy during the show!
meanings.sent4: Her room was like a shrine to Taylor Swift, a true swiftie paradise.
meanings.sent5: The swiftie's excitement at meeting Taylor Swift was palpable and infectious.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of Taylor Swift or her music.
meanings.sent1: The swiftie community eagerly awaited Taylor Swift's new album release.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit was so swiftie, with pastel colors and sparkly accessories.
meanings.sent3: The party had a swiftie theme, with Taylor Swift songs playing all night long.
meanings.sent4: The swiftie influence could be seen in the catchy lyrics and upbeat melodies of the song.
meanings.sent5: The concert had a swiftie vibe, with fans singing along to every song.
